shorts.title: Cattle truck fire on I-81 slows commute
shorts.title_distilled: Cattle truck fire on I-81 slows commute.
shorts.description: MOOSIC, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A cattle truck caught fire and is causing delays on Interstate 81 in Lackawanna County early Wednesday morning. The fire happened after 6:00 a.m. on the Southbound lanes of I-81 near the Davis Street exit in Moosic, under the overpass. At this time, there is no word of any injuries [...]
shorts.content: MOOSIC, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A cattle truck caught fire and is causing delays on Interstate 81 in Lackawanna County early Wednesday morning. The fire happened after 6:00 a.m. on the Southbound lanes of I-81 near the Davis Street exit in Moosic, under the overpass. At this time, there is no word of any injuries [...]
shorts.content_distilled: MOOSIC, LACKAWANNA COUNTY  — A cattle truck caught fire and is causing delays on Interstate 81 in Lackawanna County early Wednesday morning.

shorts.title: Weston Field Skate Park opens in Scranton
shorts.title_distilled: Weston Field Skate Park opens in Scranton.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Scranton's skateboarding community is rolling into something new. A skate park is now open. The new Weston Field Skate Park in Scranton has quickly become a hub for local skateboarders. Funded through more than $956,000 in American Rescue Plan funding, the all-concrete park features quarter pipes, rails, and ramps. The [...]

shorts.title: Key members of drug trafficking operation arrested
shorts.title_distilled: Key members of drug trafficking operation arrested.
shorts.description: JIM THORPE, CARBON COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU)— The Pennsylvania Attorney General has details on the takedown of a drug trafficking ring in NEPA. Attorney General Dave Sunday was in Jim Thorpe on Tuesday morning to announce the arrest of key members of a drug trafficking operation. Sunday, along with area law enforcement, highlighted the months-long operation that targeted [...]
